articles.description: American actor and singer who played Major Margaret Houlihan – ‘Hot Lips’ – in the 1970 film M*A*S*H
articles.content: Women in M*A*S*H (1970), Robert Altmans boisterous comedy about a mobile army hospital during the Korean war, tend to get a raw deal. The actor Sally Kellerman, who has died aged 84, was still able t… [+5890 chars]
